Use the VIEW MODE button to choose another display mode (üìñ 16). | | **No picture or sound on TV.** | - The camera is not properly connected: Connect the camera properly (üìñ 57).
- Input on the television is set to ‚ÄúTV‚Äù: Set input to ‚ÄúHDMI‚Äù (üìñ 57).
- The volume on the TV is too low: Use the controls on the television to adjust the volume (üìñ 57). | | **The computer does not recognize the camera.** | Be sure the camera and computer are correctly connected (üìñ 255). | | **FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO or FUJIFILM X Acquire fails to correctly detect the camera.** | Check the option selected for CONNECTION MODE on the camera. Select USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE before connecting the USB cable (üìñ 263). |
